Document.TEXT:
EVERYTHING UNDER $100!
FOR HER
$59--60.99 GET ANGIE'S LOOK! Borrow her flapper style from The Changeling with cloche hats from Betmar; red, getahaton.com; burgundy, hats.com
$48 COIN PURSE The "Amanda mini skinny" is a great carry-all for cards and change; coach.com
Holiday Glam
$42.50 PARTY DRESS She'll look pretty in pink, but sophisticated too; alloy.com
$19.50 REGAL FLATS Jewel accents are a luxe touch to these afforable shoes; oldnavy.com or 800-653-6289 for stores
$29 JEWELED BRACELET Adorned with gemstones, this hinged bangle is light but bold; 888-277-8953 for Banana Republic stores
$8 LIPLICIOUS GLOSS Two shades in one, peach nectar/mango mousse pictured; bathandbodyworks.com
$85 TEARDROP EARRINGS A goes-with-everything pair from Mingle that's plated in 14k gold; jenniferkaufman.com
FOR HIM
$49.50 TRAPPER HAT Faux-fur inside, warm leather outside; eddiebauer.com
$35 CUFF LINKS Keep blue skies and boat trips within arm's reach; 877-NAUTICA for stores
$85 MESSENGER BAG Made with tough "Ballistic" nylon; timbuk2.com
A Winter Must!
$45 HIP GALOSHES Possibly the fanciest galoshes ever; jackspade.com
$25 SWISS ARMY KNIVES Light and practical, these miniature Victorinox multitools contain just enough for quick mends; swissarmy.com
$14.99 FLASK A different way to stay toasty; target.com for stores
Fits in a Pouch!
$99 JACKET TO GO This faux-down coat folds into a pouch!; llbean.com
$40 CLINT EASTWOOD: A LIFE IN PICTURES Fifty years of Clint in a coffee-table book; amazon.com
FOR LITTLE ONES
$16.99 MEET MIKE He's a snowflake who learns it's cool to be different; $2 goes to St. Jude's; saks.com
Benefits St. Jude's Hospital
$28 ECO-FRIENDLY TEA SET Made from 100% recycled plastic for earth-friendly tea parties; giggle.com
Special Needs
$39.95 EXPLORER RING Recommended by Dr. Diane Twachtman-Cullen, editor-in-chief of Autism Spectrum Quarterly, to "encourage sensory awareness and motor skill development" for children with autism; fatbraintoys.com
$44.99 DIGITAL CAMERA Big buttons for little fingers and it stores 1,000 pictures; littletikes.com
$17.98 E-RACERS Sporty cars made from bamboo, natural rubber and water-based paints; magiccabin.com
Baby's First Holiday
$44 CHRISTMAS OUTFITS Three embroidered onesies in a keepsake box; chasing-fireflies.com
$59.99 ELMO LIVE! Now he sits, stands, tells jokes and plays games; toysrus.com
$19--$24 PULL TOYS Darling wooden vintage-style pull toys; olliebollen.com
$49 SAMi STACKING CUBES Ten wood blocks change faces when inserted into larger cubes; fao.com
FOR KIDS
$16.99 HANNAH MONTANA CHARM SOUNDBOOK Pop in different cast-member charms to hear them sing; BJ's, nationwide
$35 GLITTER CHUCK TAYLORS Kick into the holiday spirit; chasing-fireflies.com
$34 MOTORCYCLE SCARF He'll look cool while keeping warm; childishclothing.com
$89.99 DIDJ A Leapster for the older set; Indiana Jones and Nickelodeon math games, $29.99 each; leapfrog.com
$19.99 THREE TOYS IN ONEC Build a chopper, speedboat or airplane; lego.com
$29.99 iCARLY WEBCAM She can create a live video feed with her BFF! Includes Digital Diary software; toysrus.com
Special Needs
$48.95 WOBBLE DECK "It helps develop attention and processing skills as well as balance and coordination for kids with special needs," says Dr. Ron Savage, president of the North American Brain Injury Society; fatbraintoys.com
$5.99 HOT TOY: BAKUGAN! The balls transform into mini warriors; comes with a metallic playing card; walmart.com
FOR TWEENS
$55 SKULL FLOWER CAP Everyone from Jessica Alba to Chris Brown is a fan of the Ed Hardy line; shopkitson.com
$79 FIGURE SKATES These Softec skates are stylish and comfortable; llbean.com
$31.50 MARVEL CHRONICLE Comic lovers will be enthralled by this illustrated 70-year history of Marvel's beloved characters; amazon.com
$20 DESIGNED BY AN OLYMPIAN! Created by Olympic gold-medal-winning gymnast Nastia Liukin for Vanilla Star; Stage Stores, 877-737-8243 for locations.
$69.99 STARTER PHONE From Kajeet, with parental controls and time limits; kajeet.com
$30 each LETTER CHARMS Jazz up a book bag or purse with every letter of the alphabet; coach.com
Great Buy!
$29.88 TONY HAWK SKATEBOARD Shred the skate park with this model from the ultimate pro; walmart.com
$10 iTUNES GIFT CARDS Gift cards for songs, TV shows and movies up to $100; apple.com/itunes
FURRY FRIENDS
$28 HAPPY CAT BOWL Fun-loving felines in sunburst, olive, buttercreme and khaki; georgesf.com
$8.95 ALL-NATURAL TREATS Flavors like steak frites—customize bags with your own pet photo for $24.95; adogslife.net
Keep Spot Warm
$65 MASCOT PUFFER COAT This reversible goose-down jacket is like an extra layer of fur; mymascot.com
$28 WOOF STOCKING Filled with treats; cat stocking also available at this fair trade store; globalexchangestore.com
$19.50 LEATHER COLLAR Heart dog-tag sold separately, $12.50; landsend.com
Eco-Friendly
$8--12 PLUSHIE CHEW TOYS These Simply Fido squeaky toys are completely organic; trixieandpeanut.com
FOR THE FOODIE
$45 MARTHA'S COOKING SCHOOL Two hundred new recipes and Martha's insider techniques to cook like a pro; marthastewartstore.com
$32 JITTERBUG APRON Your favorite chef will cook up wonders in this bright red '50s-style apron; anthropologie.com
$9.99 LITTLE CHEFS Head Chef's kid-sized spatula or brush lets tots help; surlatable.com
Breast Cancer Charity
$18.99 GIVE HOPE Hope Wine donates 50% of profits to breast cancer charities; hopewine.com
$19.95 COOKIES FOR SANTA? Get 18 cookies, pick one of 10 flavors (chocolate peppermint—yum!) in their Comfort Cookie box; dancingdeer.com
$39.95 RACHAEL RAY ROASTERS Go from oven to table in style, set of two; cooking.com
$19.50 FOR COCOA LOVERS These Parisian-café hot chocolate canisters come in regular and peppermint; williams-sonoma.com
FOR THE HOME
$20 SOY CANDLE With scents like nutmeg and cardamom and a lead-free cotton wick, this "green" candle gives a cleaner burn; chesapeakebaycandle.com
$30.50 MONOGRAMMED COASTERS In elegant bronze; $24, without letter; potterybarn.com
Give Her a Swirl!
$41 SEQUIN PILLOW Soft, shiny swirls dress up a couch; $29 for cover, $12 for pillow insert; westelm.com
$31.16 WILD BIRDS OF THE AMERICAN WETLANDS Photographer Rosalie Winard's ethereal black-and-white shots of white ibis, snowy egrets and more; amazon.com
$45 GLASS GLOBE Artist Stephen Kitras' recycled glass designs are mesmerizing in any room of the house; uncommongoods.com
$14.95--28.95 SILVER "BUBBLE" FRAMES The perfect way for her to remember 2008; 4" × 6" and 8" × 10", zgallerie.com
$9.99 ORGANIC HERB KITS Basil and dill seeds in sustainable rice hull pots from Ecosource; shopgreenvillage.com
FOR THE FAMILY
$29.95 PERFECT FOR SNOW DAYS! Blast softball-size snowballs up to 50 feet; hammacher.com
Plan a Karaoke Night
$69.99 SING STAND KARAOKE Just plug in an iPod and sing along; amazon.com
$89.99 GE DIGITAL CAMERA The A735 camera is easy to use and easy on the wallet; walgreens.com
Great for HSM Fans
$29.99 HSM3 DANCE MAT Boogie to HSM3 tunes—the mat grades your moves; target.com
$29.99 SEINFELD SCENE IT Show all you know about the "show about nothing"; toysrus.com
$19.99 BELKIN ROCKSTAR Now you can share your music with friends; bestbuy.com
$99 TRI-BOT ROBOT Fun for all ages, the Tri-Bot jokes, tells stories and even has an alarm clock; kmart.com
$29.95 GINGERBREAD HOUSE A family tradition to make and enjoy; stonewallkitchen.com
ENTERTAINMENT
Books
1. Twilight Saga Collection Deluxe set of all four books in Stephenie Meyer's vampire romance, $52.29; barnesandnoble.com
2. The American Journey of Barack ObamaPhotos and essays on the President-Elect's life story by the editors of LIFE, $13.86; tower.com
3. Holidays on IceDavid Sedaris's updated collection with six hilarious new stories, $13.59; borders.com
4. The Tales of Beedle the BardFive fairy tales written and partially illustrated by J.K. Rowling, $7.59; amazon.com
DVDs
1. Love Train: The Sound of PhiladelphiaPhilly soul from artists like the Spinners and the Stylistics, $44.98; amazon.com
2. Reba: 50 Greatest HitsFeaturing her hits "Till You Love Me," "I'll Be" and "Walk On," $28.86; tower.com
3. Joy to the WorldFaith Hill's album of holiday treasures like "O Holy Night!" and "Winter Wonderland," $9.99; bestbuy.com
4. The Definitive Rod StewartSpans his career from "Maggie May" to "Da Ya Think I'm Sexy?," $15.99; barnesandnoble.com
CDs
1. Sex and the City: The Movie (Extended Cut) With bonus and deleted scenes and commentary, $19.86; walmart.com
2. Wall-ETwo robots travel to outer space, $20.29; borders.com
3. The Godfather: The Coppola RestorationThe entire trilogy is digitally restored with director Francis Ford Coppola's commentary, $49.99; amazon.com
4. Mamma Mia! 2-Disc Special Edition Movie-musical fans will love behind-the-scenes and outtakes, $22.99; amazon.com
